Reference

All functions

RQGIS-package

RQGIS: Integrating R with QGIS

comm

Community matrix of the Mt. Mongón

dem

Digital elevation model (DEM) of the Mongón study area.

find_algorithms()

Find and list available QGIS algorithms

get_args_man()

Get GIS arguments and respective default values

get_options()

Get options of parameters for a specific GIS option

get_usage()

Get usage of a specific QGIS geoalgorithm

ndvi

Normalized difference vegetation index for the Mongón study area.

open_app()

Open a QGIS application

open_help()

Access the QGIS/GRASS online help for a specific (Q)GIS geoalgorithm

pass_args()

Specifying QGIS geoalgorithm parameters the R way

qgis_session_info()

QGIS session info

random_points

Random points.

reset_path()

Reset PATH

run_qgis()

Interface to QGIS commands

set_env()

Retrieve the environment settings to run QGIS from within R

study_area

Mask of the study area

  • All functions
